definition: Dengfeng county level city in Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1], Henan

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

Dengfeng county level city in Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1], Henan

sentences.english: Therefore, Dengfeng became the popular location for the capitals and cultural center of early dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 因此，登封成为首都和早期王朝文化中心的热门地点。

sentences.english: Shaolin Temple is located in Dengfeng Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 少林寺位于河南省登封市。

sentences.english: Dengfeng is not just a tourist destination, there are abundant coal resources.
sentences.chinese: 登封地区不仅是旅游胜地，还有丰富的煤炭资源。

sentences.english: Its predecessor of Zhongyue Temple was built fistly in Dengfeng city of Henan province in Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 中岳庙的前身为太室祠，始建于秦，位于河南登封。

sentences.english: “Dengfeng city has the oldest mountain in China, Mount Song, ” Mr. Mei said.
sentences.chinese: “登封市有中国最古老的山，嵩山”，梅先生说。
